title: Episode 13: Personal Truth- Subjective and Objective Claims
description: Today I start to unpack personal truth, identifying what it is and how those beliefs play in the game of subjective and objective claim making. I hope you all enjoy and I'll continue unpacking it all next week!

transcript_parts.text: [Music]

this is my podcast where i explore
